articles.title: UP Minister 'Flees' From Court After Guilty Verdict; "Check CCTV," He Says
articles.description: A minister in Yogi Adityanath's Uttar Pradesh government has been accused of fleeing from a court in Kanpur after a guilty verdict in a 1991 case, before the quantum of sentence could be decided.
articles.content:
UP Minister Rakesh Sachan said these are all baseless cases against him

articles.description: Scientists and engineers at the Indian Space Research Organisation, or ISRO, are analysing whether its smallest rocket, SSLV-D1 - which experienced data loss in final phase - was able to inject the two satellites onboard into a stable orbit.
articles.content:

articles.title: NIA arrests IS suspect from Delhi’s Batla House
articles.description: Mohsin Ahmed was arrested after searches conducted at his premises and elsewhere Saturday in a case pertaining to “online and on-ground activities of the ISIS” registered by the agency on June 25.

articles.title: UP Man Hired Killer To Murder 17-Year-Old Daughter Over Affair, Say Cops
articles.description: Harbouring a grudge over his daughter not severing ties with her lover, a man in this Uttar Pradesh district allegedly gave a contract to kill her to a ward boy of a hospital, who injected a high dose of potassium chloride to the 17-year-old girl.
articles.content:
The ward boy confessed to police that the girl's father had given him Rs 1 lakh to kill her.
